titles: A discovrse of baptisme its institution and efficacy upon all beleevers : together with a consideration of the practice of the church in baptizing infants of beleeving parents and the practice justified / by Jer. Taylor.
author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
publisher: Printed by J. Flesher for R. Royston,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
With: Treatises of 1. the liberty of prophesying ... / Jer. Taylor. London : Printed for R. Royston, 1650.
